website_summaries.verdict: Comes with a free sleep mask and storage bag, making this desk hammock nice for travel as well.
pros: Standard buckle closures with adjustable straps
Designed to be used with your feet in multiple positions, giving it versatility
cons: Slightly heavier than other models due to cushioning but only by a few ounces

customer_reviews.title: Just as depicted, and worked well for me
customer_reviews.text: I purchased this product because I always feel the need to raise my feet off the floor during flights. I considered others, but this one appeared to have the ease of use I wanted in a compact package. It folds up pleasantly small, and was an easy addition to my "seat kit" I travel with when flying. I did find it easy to use after an initial session figuring out the length I personally need it to be. It is simple to install, and I found it very comfortable to have my legs raised even more than I have been able to before (by placing my feet on my bag). A great addition to my must-have flight kit!
customer_reviews.author: CJ Donovan

customer_reviews.title: It changed everything
customer_reviews.text: This thing changed my traveling experience! I normally sleep on planes, trains, cars, boats, if it moves I’ll fall asleep on it. But I will sleep very uncomfortably because I couldn’t really move my feet much since I’m short and there’s normally only one position in which my feet touch the floor. This thing has changed that, I use it everywhere but in cars. It’s awesome!
customer_reviews.author: Lorena

customer_reviews.title: Works OK.. Used a few times in the recent travels..
customer_reviews.text: Sturdy for sure.. sometimes I put almost more weight.. it held up OK. Even though I have it hanging in the front I use it now and then to get some relief.. I am 6ft with bit longer legs. It helped me for sure.. It is worth getting if you are making long flt travels. light weight.. fits into ziplock sandwich bag. why not take it?
customer_reviews.author: MSU Pluto

customer_reviews.title: What a bust!
customer_reviews.text: I was so super excited to get to work this morning and use this. I open it up to find that there is no way to attach it to the desk. Therefor, I will have to buy more parts. Not too happy. I guess if I was going on a plane trip I would be happy.
customer_reviews.author: Lisa

customer_reviews.title: Just what I needed for my electric scooter (ECV).
customer_reviews.text: I have a knee that doesn't bend at a 90 degree angle so I can't place that foot on the floor of my ECV, and leaving my leg just hanging out there is painful and unsafe. I just hang the foot hammock over the handlebars, adjust to the height I need, and I'm good to go all day. I was so happy to find this.
customer_reviews.author: Grandma K.

customer_reviews.title: Must have for international travel
customer_reviews.text: Worked very well on my trip. I bought additional ones for giving away to family.
customer_reviews.author: George T

customer_reviews.title: Work for our need
customer_reviews.text: Our son has dwarfism so we used this on airplanes. We put strap behind his back because nothing to attach it to on plane. Works well as footrest on generic wheelchair. Put straps around arms of chair and it made an elevated foot rest for him. A little pricey for materials used
customer_reviews.author: jean grys

customer_reviews.title: Helped my legs and back
customer_reviews.text: This simple invention really did help my comfort level on my flight by raising my legs/feet off the ground for a while. I felt more relaxed and my lower back and hips also didn't hurt as much. i highly recommend it.
customer_reviews.author: Carolyn

customer_reviews.title: Very light for a backpacking trip to Europe
customer_reviews.text: Did the job nicely and did not take up much valuable space in backpack. I'm 5'2" and it took the strain off my upper legs so that I could relax and get some sleep. Very easy to use.
customer_reviews.author: Kimberly K.P.

customer_reviews.title: Great
customer_reviews.text: It's easy to install and carry around. I have not used it on the plane but reckon it would be very useful.
customer_reviews.author: haley

customer_reviews.title: Foot rest
customer_reviews.text: Easy to take with you. Perfect for the plane or train.
customer_reviews.author: JM

customer_reviews.title: It works...an affordable, simple way of making economy class more comfortable
customer_reviews.text: As a frequent flyer on many long, transoceanic trips, I bought this out of desperation for some way of elevating my feet in tight economy cabin seating. The low price made this item a minimal risk to purchase and try out. I was very impressed by how it actually worked...the sling was comfortable for my feet and legs, and seems to work well on the seat/tray table in front of me. This has really made a difference in my travels.
customer_reviews.author: Linda A

customer_reviews.title: Good idea but...
customer_reviews.text: I have not tested it out on an airplane but I did try it on the back seat of my minivan. Not sure there is enough room to use this effectively. Perhaps I will figure out a way of putting it to use later, but as of now, I haven't found a way.
customer_reviews.author: pika6pak

customer_reviews.title: Haven't Seen Any Purpose For This Product
customer_reviews.text: I haven't figured out how to use this! I don't know what plane one needs to be seated on to hang this thing, and then stretch your legs out to 'hang' them to sleep. Nice carrying bag, neat eye mask but tell me how to use this hanging invention?
customer_reviews.author: Shopper

customer_reviews.title: Nicely made.
customer_reviews.text: Haven't used it yet, it was bought for long flights.
customer_reviews.author: Icelady

customer_reviews.title: Great product for the price
customer_reviews.text: I use this to raise my legs while laying down and while at my desk.
customer_reviews.author: The Truth

customer_reviews.title: wast of time
customer_reviews.text: i brought this for my wife to use on an international flight, it was non-effective and usless, it might be good for the back seat of a car.
customer_reviews.author: blaster

customer_reviews.title: Useless
customer_reviews.text: Useless. I bought this to use on airlines however I found but my feet or kegs kept slipping off the fabric. Flawed.
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: Not worth your time sorry
customer_reviews.text: Would not stay in place and not very comfortable at all.
customer_reviews.author: Nikki

customer_reviews.title: Works like to should. Comfortable.
customer_reviews.text: Works well. Not hard to set up. Just have to adjust it so that it is comfortable.
customer_reviews.author: monica

customer_reviews.title: Worked fine
customer_reviews.text: Works as advertised. Totally worth the five bucks or so.
customer_reviews.author: HF

product_meta.title: Ergonomic Foot Rest, PRAVETTE Travel Footrest Airplane Leg Rest Flight Foot Hammock Carry-on Travel Pillow Under Desk Accessories
feature_bullets: Adjustable foot rest hammock helps reduce DVT risk on flights. Improves circulation and reduce swelling by raising the legs. Relaxation when you need it on the long journey

This leg rest pillow is idea for travel home office airplane, work or relax time, just hanging it to the tray table or under desk. The memory foam eye sleep mask (for free) is an excellent addition to you in travel flight or family room

Adjustable strap designed to suit exactly your height, the max length 32”to the min length 17”(appr.)suitable for different people, whether you are men,women, kids, adult or child this airplane footrest will help you keep your feet up and keep your posture relaxed
The storaged size is decreased into 8”L x 4”W(appr.), foldable features easy carrying and it can also be clipped to the outside of your carry-on luggage

Special design to reduce the lower back pain, stiffness and leg swelling suffered during long flights. The travel footrest is very useful for lengthening your foot, swing your legs to relieve fatigue and refreshing arriving feeling

specifications.Customer Reviews: 3.9 out of 5 stars34 ratings3.9 out of 5 stars
